attributes.action: Keep the NHS under British control
attributes.additional_details: It has emerged from the release of e-mails under the freedom of information act that talks have taken place with foreign companies over the running of up to 20 NHS hospitals This petition calls for a ban on any foreign organisation having control of any part of the NHS. The NHS is too precious to risk by allowing any foriegn profit led company being given control. Thank you for helping to save our NHS
